experiences.title: Mechanical Design Engineer + Software Engineer Assistant
bullets: Added user login and password reset functionality to a web app with a Bootstrap/Angular.js front-end and a Node.js/Express back-end. Used SendGrid API to send emails.
Wrote Python scripts to test the company’s API product.
Created tutorials for creating applications that utilized the Dronesmith API which allows for control of real or virtual drones with HTTP requests.
Served as primary writer of electronic hardware documentation and maintained API documentation.
Tested new versions of electronic hardware and software products.
Designed the mechanical components of the company’s flagship drone.
Steadily improved every aspect of the drone’s mechanical design based on feedback from customers and changes in the electronic systems.

experiences.company: Open Source Wifi Blinds IoT Electronic Device

bullets: Wrote C code for a ESP8266 micro-controller to control a motor and get data from sensors.
TCP Websocket connection to transmit data.
